TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthorizationContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供授權事件的內容資訊。

span.span: Provides context information of an authorization event.

summary.span: 這包括代表呼叫端的主體、被要求的資源，以及正在執行的動作。

span.span: This includes the principal that represents the caller, the resource that is being requested, and the action that is being performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示宣告授權管理員的實作中使用的內容類別，以判斷是否應該授權的主體 （主體） 指定資源上執行指定的動作。The class represents the context that is used by a claims authorization manager, an implementation of the class, to determine whether a principal (subject) should be authorized to perform a specified action on a given resource. 宣告授權管理員會評估授權內容中的方法，並拒絕或宣告為基礎的授與存取呈現的主體。The claims authorization manager evaluates the authorization context in the method and either denies or grants access based on the claims presented by the principal. 屬性包含的主體所要求的授權，屬性包含在其獲得授權的主體、 資源和屬性包含的動作，主體想要在資源上執行。The property contains the principal for which authorization is being requested, the property contains the resource on which the principal is being authorized, and the property contains the actions that the principal intends to perform on the resource. 資源和動作會表示為集合的宣告。不過，在大部分情況下，每一個集合包含單一宣告。Both the resource and the action are represented as a collection of claims; however, in most cases, each collection contains a single claim. ## Examples 使用中的程式碼範例主題取自`Claims Based Authorization`範例。The code example that is used in the topic is taken from the `Claims Based Authorization` sample. 這個範例提供可授權主體在組態中指定的原則為基礎的自訂宣告授權管理員。This sample provides a custom claims authorization manager that can authorize subjects based on a policy that is specified in configuration. 此自訂管理員包含三個基本元件： 的類別衍生自實作管理員`ResourceAction`組資源和動作的類別和原則的讀取器讀取並編譯中所指定的原則組態檔。This custom manager consists of three basic components: a class derived from that implements the manager, the `ResourceAction` class that pairs a resource and an action, and a policy reader that reads and compiles policy that is specified in the configuration file. 這會編譯原則可以然後宣告授權管理員用來評估來授與資源的存取權的主體。This compiled policy can then be used by the claims authorization manager to evaluate a principal in order to authorize access to resources. 並非所有項目會顯示為了簡短起見。Not all elements are shown for the sake of brevity. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼會示範自訂宣告授權管理員的方法。The following code shows the method for the custom claims authorization manager. 評估主體的函式會根據資源和動作中指定叫用。A function that evaluates the principal based on the resource and action specified in the is invoked. 此函式會傳回`true`或`false`，其授與或拒絕之主體的存取。This function returns either `true` or `false`, which either grants or denies access to the principal. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#5)] 下列 XML 顯示組態中所指定的授權原則的範例。The following XML shows an example of the authorization policy that was specified in configuration. 在第一個原則中，主體必須擁有一個指定的宣告，以便在指定的資源上執行指定的動作。In the first policy, the principal must possess one of the specified claims in order to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在第二個原則中，主體必須擁有這兩個宣告能夠在指定的資源上執行指定的動作。In the second policy, the principal must possess both claims to be able to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在所有其他主體自動授與存取權，不論它擁有的宣告。In all others, the principal is automatically granted access regardless of the claims it possesses. ```xml ... ```
